title: Latest OnePlus 9 series update brings March 2022 patches, fixes Google Pay bug
content:
After rolling out a stable Android 12 update to the OnePlus 8 and OnePlus 9R last week, OnePlus is back again with another round of software updates. The company has just released new OxygenOS updates for the OnePlus 9 series, bringing updated security patches and other improvements. The OnePlus 9 and OnePlus 9 Pro are

The post Latest OnePlus 9 series update brings March 2022 patches, fixes Google Pay bug appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus has started rolling out the March 2022 security update to the OnePlus 9, OnePlus 9 Pro, and OnePlus 9RT. Read on.
